taskDescription: The double bond of an enamine (alkene + amine) is much more nucleophilic than a typical alkene double bond. Assuming that the nitrogen atom in an enamine is sp2-hybridized, draw an orbital picture of an enamine, and explain why the double bond is electron-rich.
